title: Three Flames
content:
In realms of love, where hearts entwine,
Three flames arise, with passions divine.

First, the slow burn, a gentle start,
Two souls ignite, a work of art.
With tender touch and whispered word,
A love so deep, forever heard.

Then, compromise, a steady light,
Where give and take make all things right.
In shared decisions, paths align,
A bond of strength, forever shine.

Lastly, benefits, a fleeting blaze,
Two hearts agree, in fleeting days.
No strings attached, a simple plea,
To satisfy desires, and then be free.
short_summary: poem about three types of couples, couple of slow burn, couple of compromise and couple of benifits
